sense.name: Set anew; adjust after a failure.
sense.examples: We reset the clock after the power came back on. The bond is reset annually to a market value of 101. The machine must be reset after overheating.

sense.name: Set to zero.
sense.examples: Reset the scale before each step of the experiment. All the dials should be reset to achieve equilibrium. Reset the chronograph on your watch before each lap.
